title: Itaewon residents share how they are feeling after Halloween's tragic crowd surge
description: How residents in the Itaewon area in Seoul, South Korea are feeling right now, and how Halloween's tragic crowd surge might affect the "party mecca of South Korea."
content:encoded: How residents in the Itaewon area in Seoul, South Korea are feeling right now, and how Halloween's tragic crowd surge might affect the "party mecca of South Korea."
dc:creator: Raquel Maria Dillon
